Spine & Pain Institute of Texas serves Dallas, TX and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions focused on improving quality of life for patients suffering from chronic and acute pain conditions. Our state-of-the-art facility combines advanced diagnostic capabilities with innovative treatment approaches to address a wide spectrum of spinal and pain-related disorders. Led by board-certified pain management specialists, our team employs a multidisciplinary approach that integrates interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and behavioral health strategies to create personalized treatment plans.

At the Spine & Pain Institute of Texas, we specialize in treating complex pain conditions including herniated discs, spinal stenosis, sciatica, failed back surgery syndrome, complex regional pain syndrome, and neuropathic pain disorders. Our interventional procedures include epidural steroid injections, facet joint injections, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and minimally invasive spine procedures. Each treatment plan is tailored to address the unique needs and circumstances of individual patients, with the goal of maximizing pain relief while minimizing medication dependence.

Patient-Centered Approach

We pride ourselves on delivering compassionate care in a welcoming environment where patients feel heard and respected. Our administrative team works diligently to ensure a smooth experience from appointment scheduling through treatment and follow-up care. Most major insurance plans are accepted, and our staff assists patients in navigating coverage options for specialized procedures. New patients can expect comprehensive evaluations that thoroughly assess their pain history, previous treatments, and current symptoms to develop effective management strategies.

Visit Our Dallas Location

The Spine & Pain Institute of Texas is conveniently located at 3503 W Wheatland Rd, Suite 100, Dallas, TX 75237. Our modern facility is equipped with the latest diagnostic and treatment technologies to provide optimal care for our patients. To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, please call +1 469-313-0040. Office hours are Monday through Friday from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM, with some early morning and late afternoon appointments available to accommodate busy schedules.

For my procedure I've had a few this what's the best one yet I didn't feel a pain only the Doctor said I will feel a pinch and that just exactly what it was a pinch on both sides and he put the medicine in my back I can feel it going in with no problems no other pain I just feel great when it was over because I was determined I didn't want any more pain because I've been walking bent over like I was 100 years old when I shouldn't have been but today I'm better I done got up and walked around a little bit and I have had I had to take 2 Tylenol over to the morning about 2 am or 3 am in the morning  I took that and set up on side of the bed so they and just let it work his way and I got back in bed and I went to sleep and I had a good sleep. I then told her I would not be attending bc is that's how they treat patients over the phone I'd hate to see how I'd be treated in person. Acknowledging & taking accountability for mishaps is one thing but being rude is another!

Spine & Joint Pain Specialists serves Schertz, Texas and the greater San Antonio metropolitan area with comprehensive pain management solutions. Established with a mission to provide relief and restore quality of life, our specialized medical practice focuses on treating chronic and acute pain conditions affecting the spine, joints, and musculoskeletal system. Our board-certified physicians combine evidence-based treatments with personalized care plans to address each patient's unique needs.

At Spine & Joint Pain Specialists, we offer a wide range of interventional procedures and non-surgical treatments designed to target pain at its source. Our services include epidural steroid injections, facet joint blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and regenerative medicine options such as platelet-rich plasma therapy. We specialize in treating conditions including herniated discs, sciatica, spinal stenosis, arthritis, and complex regional pain syndrome.

Patient-Centered Approach

Our practice distinguishes itself through a multidisciplinary approach that considers all aspects of a patient's condition. We believe in creating individualized treatment plans that may combine interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and lifestyle modifications. Our goal is not just to mask symptoms but to address underlying causes while minimizing reliance on opioid medications whenever possible.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Located at 5700 Schertz Pkwy, Suite 130 in Schertz, TX 78154, our modern facility is equipped with advanced diagnostic and treatment technology. The clinic environment is designed for patient comfort, with accessible parking and a welcoming atmosphere. We accept most major insurance plans and work diligently to ensure patients understand their coverage options.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, patients can call us at (210) 541-0700 or visit our website at http://painsanantonio.com/. Our dedicated staff is available to answer questions and assist with appointment scheduling Monday through Friday from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM.

Patient-Focused Care

Integrated Pain Associates - Temple serves patients throughout Temple, Texas and surrounding areas with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our dedicated team of spine and pain specialists combines years of clinical expertise with compassionate care to help patients find relief from chronic and acute pain conditions. Located conveniently at 5244 S 31st St in Temple, we've established ourselves as a trusted resource for residents seeking effective pain treatment options without immediately resorting to invasive procedures.

At Integrated Pain Associates - Temple, our physicians are highly trained experts in diagnosing and treating various pain conditions. We understand that pain is a complex and personal experience, which is why we develop tailored, individual treatment plans for each patient. Our approach focuses on identifying the root cause of pain rather than simply masking symptoms, allowing for more effective long-term management and improved quality of life.

Our Treatment Philosophy

We firmly believe in exhausting all conservative treatment options before considering major spine surgery. This patient-centered philosophy means we explore minimally invasive procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and other interventional techniques that can provide relief without the risks and recovery time associated with surgical intervention. Our advanced procedures incorporate the latest evidence-based practices in pain management.

Comprehensive Services

Our practice offers a wide range of treatments for conditions including but not limited to back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and complex regional pain syndrome. The team at Integrated Pain Associates - Temple works collaboratively to ensure each patient receives the most appropriate care for their specific condition.

Contact Information

If you're suffering from pain and seeking expert care in Texas, call us today at +1 254-566-5176 to schedule an appointment. Our office is located at 5244 S 31st St, Temple, TX 76502. For more information about our services and locations, visit our website at https://ipaclinic.com/locations/temple.

They have done just about everything and don't have the answer or if there is a way to fix my pain in my back. I know they're trying their hardest. I had one big issue with the spine simulator not being in long enough to see if it helped or not. Only had 2 full days with it in. Wish it would have been 3 or 4 full days. Dr McDavid is great, knowledgeable and caring.|Wow I was so thankful for  Dr McDavid he is beyond awesome.  He talked to me like a friend.  I lost my son 12-18 the conversation was between us.  He helped me  so much. His loving words comforted me. IPA are such caring people you could ever have in your life. They are awesome and caring.|I can't say one good thing about my husband's care that he received while going to IPA. I honestly believe their surgical center is putting patients at risk. I have never seen patients treated so poorly. Complete incompetence at every level. From answering the phone, to procedures and finally billing. It is apparent that they are only in it for the money when you're told they have quotas to fulfill and goals to meet for surgeries. (I was told that 4 days after my husband's spinal stimulator placement.) I wouldn't take a stray dog here. They fluff the billing for insurance and then send an astronomical bill, once you call they'll say "oops it was a mistake." If you need  your records, you'll be forced to file a grievance with the Federal and State to get those. They are the worst kind of crooks. Taking advantage of those in pain.|Staff was great.  Dr Irvine was not at all courteous.  He was condescending and rude. He was 31 minutes late and did not care that I had another appointment I was going to be late for.  I was discharged from his clinic and need to find another pain management clinic.  Nothing we can do to make a complaint because he owns the company.|Office personal didn't provide appropriate instructions for procedure requiring me to try the procedure without anesthesia.  I definitely would not recommend it.  Lots of driving and time, not to mention money for a wasted trip.  Office personnel also put an earlier time in the computer for my appointment which said I was late.  I showed her my card with the time they gave me after trying to check myself into their new system which didn't include my PCP and was confusing.   Don't expect medication in a timely manner either.  They required me to turn over medication from my primary care doctor and I am still waiting for them to call in a new prescription.  Of course,  no one is available to contact after 5.  As icing on the cake while I was waiting for my test, a young woman tested positive for a fever over 100.  They let her cool off and after a trip to the bathroom she had her temp retested at 99, at which time she was allowed to go in.  When I went back she was dresses in black with other ?doctors.  She wasn't a nurse.  This made me very nervous.  It just doesn't seem like a very professional establishment.|I came to IPA after my car wreck and have been seeing Dr. McDavid all this time. When I tell you he is amazing that would be such a understatement. He takes the time to truly listen to my concerns and addresses them accordingly. He truly is a God sent.|Everyone here at the pain clinic is so very nice. They listen to whatever you need to talk to them about, They actually listen to you and include you in what is going to happen. I highly recommend if you are in pain to stop by and see them..

column3:
Advanced Pain Care serves Round Rock, TX and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions since 2002. Under the leadership of Dr. Malone and a team of dedicated pain specialists, Advanced Pain Care has established itself as a premier destination for patients seeking relief from chronic and acute pain conditions. With an extensive network of 15 locations, 4 surgery centers, 3 pharmacies, and a specialized physical therapy clinic, the practice offers integrated care designed to address the full spectrum of pain-related challenges.

At Advanced Pain Care, patients receive specialized treatment for a wide range of pain conditions including post-surgical pain, cancer-related discomfort, degenerative disc disease, joint disease, fibromyalgia, migraines, and musculoskeletal issues. The clinic excels in treating specific pain locations such as back, shoulder, hip, neck, sacroiliac, sciatica, and spinal regions. Each treatment plan is customized to address the unique needs and circumstances of individual patients.

Expert Medical Team

The Round Rock location features renowned specialists including Neurosurgeon Dr. Glenn E. Harper and Dr. Andre Chen, who specializes in Opioid Stewardship & Behavioral Health. This multidisciplinary approach ensures patients receive care that addresses both the physical and psychological aspects of pain management. The clinic's dual specialties in Pain Management & Neurosurgery allow for comprehensive treatment options ranging from conservative therapies to advanced surgical interventions when necessary.

Patient-Centered Approach

Advanced Pain Care prioritizes accessibility and convenience for patients struggling with pain conditions. Their Round Rock clinic at 2000 S Mays St #201 serves as a central hub for pain management services in the area. Patients can easily schedule appointments by visiting https://austinpaindoctor.com/ or calling +1 512-244-4272. The practice's patient-centered philosophy focuses on developing individualized treatment strategies that improve quality of life while addressing the root causes of pain.

I've been a patient at this facility for 12+ years and have endured a number of business growing pains. Although I reside 60+ miles away from the Round Rock location, I continue making the trip in order to receive their high level of care.|Just wanted to say the Round Rock location on mays street has been nothing less than excellent for me. She is extremely detail oriented, courteous, compassionate, and truly knows what she is doing and cares for her patients. She will listen to your concerns and adjust your treatment plan as needed and in a safe manner. I could go on and on. He always goes above and beyond for his patients.|The staff and providers at Round Rock are always so friendly and so committed to helping me manage my pain.

I'm so glad I found such a great place and a wonderful team to help me manage my pain when we moved here.|Sherrita and Daniel are amazing! They are always smiling and happy. My doctor, Dr. Clayton Adams is extremely supportive and knowledgeable. He and Sherrita (my fav FNP-C) both take time to hear my concerns. I never feel rushed or unheard.

column2: Allay Spine and Pain Management: Douglas Maxey, MD
column3:
Allay Spine and Pain Management serves McKinney, Texas with specialized pain management solutions under the expert guidance of Dr. Douglas Maxey, MD. As a premier pain management clinic in Collin County, Allay offers comprehensive care for patients suffering from chronic pain conditions, spinal disorders, and related ailments. Dr. Maxey brings his extensive experience as a board-certified anesthesiologist and pain management physician to provide targeted treatments that address the root causes of discomfort rather than merely masking symptoms.

Since beginning his practice in 2013, Dr. Maxey has established himself as a leading pain management specialist in the McKinney area. His approach combines medical expertise with compassionate care, ensuring that each patient receives personalized attention. As a board-certified physician, Dr. Maxey utilizes evidence-based techniques and cutting-edge procedures to help patients regain mobility and reduce dependence on pain medications.

Comprehensive Pain Management Services

At Allay Spine and Pain Management, patients benefit from a thorough diagnostic process that identifies the precise source of their pain. Dr. Maxey believes in fully investigating each case before developing customized treatment plans aligned with patients' individual goals and lifestyles. The clinic offers various interventional procedures, medication management, and rehabilitative approaches to address conditions ranging from herniated discs to complex regional pain syndrome.

Patient-Centered Philosophy

What distinguishes Allay Spine and Pain Management is its commitment to patient partnership. Dr. Maxey views himself not just as a physician but as a collaborator in improving each patient's quality of life. This philosophy translates into conscientious care where patients are active participants in their treatment decisions. The clinic's supportive staff ensures an exceptional experience from the first consultation through ongoing care.

Contact Information

Allay Spine and Pain Management welcomes new patients at their conveniently located office at 3725 S Lake Forest Dr, Suite 114, McKinney, TX 75070. Appointments can be scheduled by calling +1 469-545-1082. For additional information about services and treatment options, patients are encouraged to visit the clinic's website at www.allayspineandpain.com.
column11:

At Allay Spine and Pain Management, Dr. Maxey and the staff are committed to providing an exceptional experience. Dr. Maxey sees himself as a partner in improving each patient's quality of life. He believes in fully investigating the cause of a patient's pain and developing a personalized treatment plan according to their goals.

column2: Lone Star Spine & Pain Institute - San Marcos Pain Management Specialists
column3:
Lone Star Spine & Pain Institute serves San Marcos, Texas and surrounding communities with specialized pain management solutions. Our practice is staffed by board-certified physicians who have completed advanced fellowship training in pain management techniques. At our modern facility on Wonder World Drive, we take pride in implementing the latest minimally invasive therapies designed to effectively address chronic and acute pain conditions while minimizing recovery time.

As active members of several professional pain management organizations, our specialists have contributed significantly to advancing the field's understanding and treatment approaches for chronic pain. Our collaborative approach ensures patients receive thorough evaluations and personalized treatment plans that address their specific pain concerns.

Our Treatment Philosophy

We believe in offering the full spectrum of pain management options, from conservative non-surgical approaches to minimally invasive surgical interventions. Every treatment plan is tailored to the individual patient with three primary goals: facilitating quick recovery, restoring functional ability, and improving overall quality of life.

Visit Our San Marcos Location

The Lone Star Spine & Pain Institute welcomes new patients at our convenient San Marcos office located at 1320 Wonder World Dr, Suite 106, San Marcos, TX 78666. To schedule a consultation with our pain management specialists, call us at (512) 851-1165 or visit our website at redefineyourpain.com to learn more about our innovative treatment options.
column11: We are a group of board certified physicians with fellowship training in pain management. We are constantly implementing the latest minimally invasive therapies to treat our patients' pain. Additionally, we are members of several professional organizations and have contributed to advancing our understanding and treatment of chronic pain. As a group, our focus is to offer the full breadth of treatment options tailored to our patients' individual needs. Therefore, we offer non surgical solutions to minimally invasive surgical options with a focus on quick recovery, return of function, and improvement in quality of life.

column2: MOHAMMED I KHAN, M.D., Board Certified Interventional Pain Management
column3:
Apex Interventional Pain & Spine serves Coppell, TX and the greater DFW area with comprehensive pain management solutions. Under the leadership of Dr. Mohammed I. Khan, M.D., our practice delivers personalized care for patients suffering from both acute and chronic pain conditions. As a double board-certified physician in Interventional Pain Management and Physical Medicine, Dr. Khan brings exceptional expertise to every treatment plan, ensuring patients receive the most effective and appropriate care for their specific needs.

Dr. Khan earned his medical degree from Texas Tech University and further distinguished himself by completing his specialized Interventional Pain Management Fellowship at the prestigious University of Pittsburgh Medical Center. This advanced training enables our team to offer cutting-edge treatments that address the root causes of pain rather than simply masking symptoms.

Comprehensive Pain Management Services

At Apex Interventional Pain & Spine, we specialize in treating a wide range of pain conditions, with particular expertise in spine-related issues. Our approach combines innovative interventional techniques with evidence-based practices to deliver optimal outcomes. Whether you're suffering from chronic back pain, joint discomfort, nerve conditions, or post-surgical pain, our clinic provides tailored solutions designed to improve your quality of life.

Conveniently Located to Serve You

Our modern facility is strategically located at 149 SH 121, Frontage Rd Suite 105, Coppell, TX 75019, making us easily accessible to patients throughout the Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex. To schedule a consultation with Dr. Khan and take the first step toward effective pain relief, call us at (972) 833-7246 or visit our website at https://apexinterventionalpain.com/ for more information about our services and approach to pain management.
column11:
Apex Interventional Pain & Spine is committed to providing leading-edge pain management and spine care services. We are located in Coppell, TX, in the DFW area; our clinic is ideal for those seeking relief from chronic pain and spinal problems.
At our clinic, we excel in providing pain management solutions. Dr. Mohammad I. Khan, MD, is a double board-certified physician in Interventional Pain Management and Physical Medicine, he ensures each of our patients receives personalized care tailored to their needs, both acute and chronic concerns. He has earned his M.D. from Texas Tech University, and completed his Interventional Pain Management Fellowship at the University of Pittsburgh Medical Center.

Permian Basin Pain Management serves Midland, Texas with exceptional interventional pain management services. Led by board-certified anesthesiologist and pain management specialist Dr. F.O. McGehee IV, MD, the practice delivers comprehensive care for patients suffering from chronic and acute pain conditions. Their conservative approach combines evidence-based treatments with cutting-edge interventional techniques, ensuring patients receive safe, effective relief while minimizing reliance on medication alone.

At Permian Basin Pain Management, patients benefit from specialized care for a wide range of conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, peripheral neuropathy, shingles, carpal tunnel syndrome, and compression fractures. The practice utilizes advanced diagnostic methods to identify the root causes of pain, allowing for targeted treatment plans tailored to each patient's unique needs.

Patient-Centered Approach

What distinguishes Permian Basin Pain Management is their unwavering commitment to patient-centered care. Dr. McGehee and his team take time to thoroughly evaluate each case, educate patients about their conditions, and develop comprehensive treatment strategies that address both immediate pain relief and long-term management. This collaborative approach empowers patients to take an active role in their recovery journey.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Located at 1802 W Wall St in Midland, TX, their modern facility is equipped with the latest technology for interventional procedures and pain management treatments. The practice environment is designed to provide comfort and convenience for patients throughout their care experience.

For more information or to schedule a consultation, visit www.permianbasinpainmanagement.com or call +1 432-683-3121. Permian Basin Pain Management welcomes new patients seeking effective solutions for chronic and acute pain conditions.

Amhan Pain Management Clinic serves Sherman, Texas and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions tailored to each patient's unique needs. Founded with a mission to improve quality of life for those suffering from chronic pain conditions, our clinic combines evidence-based medical treatments with compassionate care to help patients regain functionality and comfort.

At Amhan Pain Management Clinic, we offer a multidisciplinary approach to treating various pain conditions, including back pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and post-surgical pain. Our board-certified specialists utilize advanced diagnostic techniques to identify the root causes of pain, allowing for more effective and targeted treatment plans.

Our Treatment Approaches

We provide a range of interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy recommendations, and lifestyle modification guidance. Our team stays current with the latest advancements in pain medicine to ensure patients receive the most effective care available.

Patient-Centered Philosophy

Understanding that pain affects each person differently, we develop individualized treatment plans that address both the physical and emotional aspects of chronic pain. Our compassionate staff works closely with patients to establish realistic goals and monitor progress throughout the treatment journey.

Visit Our Sherman Location

Located at 2605 Masters St, Sherman, TX 75090, our modern facility is equipped with state-of-the-art technology for accurate diagnosis and effective treatment. We welcome new patients and referrals from healthcare providers throughout Texoma and North Texas.

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, please call us at +1 903-813-8270. Our friendly staff is ready to assist you on your path to pain relief and improved quality of life.

Over the years, he has advised me to see specialists in two instances in order to fix or improve my condition; this seem to be "above and beyond", to me. He prescribes medicine for pain as necessary, and offers shots to help with deep pain, but he does not over-prescribe. I am impressed.|This doctor only prescribes ultram or tylenol 3. I have tried both for failed back surgery syndrome. I lost my job due to my condition and was hoping to get back to work and have a half normal life again. Due to the only meds this clinic prescribes, i am no longer going to be able to carry out normal job duties due to my pain levels. I am not satisfied with the results of my visit. I will probably find another pain management doctor who will actually do just that, help manage my pain. Totally dissatisfied with this clinic|Was referred to Dr. Amhan before surgery.  He and his staff were professional.  He listened to my concerns and then scheduled me for a few injections.  These went well. I am very pleased with Dr. Amhan and his staff.|I have had multiple surgeries on my back for bulging disc and additional surgery not recommended at this time, Dr Ahman has given me injections which help for a while and has prescribed me pain medication to give temporary relief between injections, he is a very caring Physician and I recommend him.|I have been going to this clinic for a number of years for chronic back pain and I am well satisfied with the type of treatment I have received. I have given them a 5 star rating for caring and friendly service.|Make sure he is in a good mood before injections. you will feel pain for weeks after the injections.

column3:
Regency Pain & Therapy Institute serves the Dallas-Fort Worth, Texas area with comprehensive pain management solutions tailored to each patient's unique needs. Located in Mansfield, this premier medical practice specializes in interventional techniques that address both acute and chronic pain conditions. The institute's team of board-certified physicians combines cutting-edge treatments with compassionate care, helping patients regain mobility and improve their quality of life through minimally invasive procedures and personalized treatment plans.

At Regency Pain & Therapy Institute, patients benefit from a multidisciplinary approach that encompasses interventional pain management, neuromusculoskeletal medicine, sports medicine, and osteopathic manipulative medicine. The practice utilizes advanced diagnostic tools to identify the root causes of pain, rather than simply masking symptoms. Their comprehensive treatment options include nerve blocks, epidural steroid injections, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and regenerative medicine therapies designed to promote natural healing.

Patient-Centered Approach

The institute prides itself on delivering individualized care in a comfortable, supportive environment. New patients undergo thorough evaluations to develop customized treatment strategies that address their specific pain conditions. The medical team works collaboratively with primary care physicians and other specialists to ensure coordinated care that considers the patient's complete health profile and recovery goals.

Convenient Location and Accessibility

Conveniently situated at 74 Regency Parkway in Mansfield, TX 76063, the facility offers state-of-the-art treatment rooms equipped with the latest medical technology. Patients throughout the Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex can easily access the clinic's services. For appointments or consultations, patients can call +1 817-419-6111 or visit their comprehensive website at www.regencypain.com to learn more about available treatments and patient resources.
column11: Regency Pain & Therapy is an interventional pain management, neuromusculoskeletal medicine, sports medicine and osteopathic manipulative medicine practice located in the Dallas-Fort Worth, Texas, area.

column38: queenthatIam Dingus|May Jay|Angela|Hope Love & Peace|Tonya|Jordyn Jimenez|Lej Jay|Randi
column40:
Hey there! How yall doin?  I pray the people reading  this post are blessed  and highly  favored. I am going to send a shout-out to Miss Amy. The Big Dawg in the Physical therapy  room. She is large and in charge but comes in a tiny package.  She is so kind, caring, and compassionate.  She is knowledgeable  about her profession. She is very attentive  when she is evaluating  you for physical  therapy.  She takes her time.  She listens to everything you tell her. She gives great advice, feedback , and suggestions to help you improve your condition.She makes you feel so comfortable.
I have back issues, neck issues, 2 knee replacements, 2 rotator cuff surgeries, 3 carpal tunnel surgeries, and 2 auto immune diseases that affect muscles, nerves, and joints It is a lot to deal with. But by the grace of God. I am still standing tall in mind, body, and spirit.
Ms. Amy made a recommendation  to confer with a podiatrist. His name is Dr. J.Landry in Arlington.  She described how the joints are interconnected and work  together to make the joints  move in sync with each other. Ms. Amy went on to tell me how the foot  joints can or maybe the culprit to knee and back pain.I went to AOA yall. Lord , I just have to shake my head. I consulted with them initially about my back and foot. It was a big mistake. Dr. W told me Miss Amy didn't  know what she was talking about. He is a professional, and she is just a physical  therapist. The way he talked to me was insulting and hurtful. I never went back. I thought about it. I got a referral from Dr. Hermine and went to see Dr. Landry. I started treatment with my foot. Eventually, I had surgery  to correct my foot problem. Guess what, yall? There was a bone, Dr. Landry put back into position. Immediately a few days after foot surgery, I noticed my right knee was not hurting anymore. I could bend down, get up, move, and walk so much better. I was so grateful to God . I had a knee replacement. It was so painful. I had this surgery in 2018. My back pain was excruciating. I had the foot surgery  in 2024. The recommendation  that Ms. Amy made it on point! I am so much better from the recommendation  she made. So Guess who was wrong when he said  that he was more professionally  trained and Ms Amy didn't  know what she was talking about!!! Now, Dr. Weiser is a great surgeon for some people but not for me. He was wrong!! I don't  mind saying it.
If you are looking for excellent physical  therapy I highly recommend  Ms. Amy. She does an excellent job in what she does. Regency Physical  therapy  employees, great people, the Sargeant Ms. Brittany, Amazing Amanda,Gracey full of Grace, Venia for Victory and Gabe Mr. baseball !! They all work well together with Ms. Amy leading the way. They are great with all the patients . They  all have helped me at different stages in my life to get stronger and  better mentally,physically , and spiritually.It has helped me to live a better life and deal with pain in a more effective  way.When you know better you can do better.  It takes  time ,dedication , and a lot of hard work.  If you  need physical  therapy, choosing Regency  Pain & therapy is an excellent  choice. I just had to give you props, Ms. Amy. Go head, girl!!!|I'm a patient of Dr. Cindy NG, she's a wonderful doctor! My latest visit was today 1/13/25 and I waited for that one, but I didn't mind waiting because she's a good doctor. She's very caring and thoughtful person. She listens to my concerns and explain anything l have a issue with. She's really takes time to help her patients. Thanks Dr. NG! (I only gave 4 stars because the exam room was freezing!)|I was a new patient to Regency Pain. I needed to reschedule an appointment. Called 12 times Monday to no avail. No one ever answered the phone!! I tried calling 4-5 times on Tuesday morning and same thing happened. Finally, I at least found a line that went through to an answering machine, so I left a message.
The nice young lady who responded said that sometimes they have to just let phones go unanswered because everyone is too busy to answer incoming calls!! I decided I would find another pain doctor if their staff was allowing phone calls to go unanswered.|Dr.Ng is one of the most attentive and caring physicians around. She looks into things deeper than surface level and truly cares about her patient's health. Not just pushing you through the door to get to the next one. Doctors like her are hard to come by. Thanks for all you do, Dr. Ng definitely my favorite doctor!|Dr. NG is one of the best!! She's attentive, compassionate and knowledgeable. She takes the time to evaluate and determine the best treatment to get the maximum results. I have been seeing Dr. NG for almost two years and highly  recommend her.|Dr Sacky is very patient care focused rather than trying to get to the next appointment he spends time with me and answers all my questions.  He also takes care to not over extend my finances which is very much appreciated.|I was able to see Doctor Dirnberger. The visit went well. He was very attentive and able to explain a lot of things to me in detail. The visit was not rushed. I appreciated the work he did to try to understand what was going on with me. Sam, his medical student was great as well. I liked the fact they took the time to look over my notes and make recommendations for me.|Dr. Butler is soo through and kind. I've had a very pleasant experience working with him on my pain. January 2025 will be 2 years with an everyday headache. I've gone through a couple of procedures to try to help the headaches but they haven't been successful but that's just my experience it could work for other people. Hermine Dr Butlers N.P. is very kind too and always makes me feel welcome. She gives hugs too lol THIS is a very professional place and I'm sure all the doctors here are great. If you're looking for a new pain management place I would definitely recommend Regeny pain and therapy

column2: North Texas Comprehensive Spine & Pain Center
column3:
North Texas Comprehensive Spine & Pain Center serves Sherman, TX and surrounding North Texas communities with specialized pain management solutions. Our dedicated team of board-certified physicians combines extensive experience with compassionate care to address various chronic pain conditions. We understand how debilitating persistent pain can be, which is why we develop personalized treatment plans tailored to each patient's unique needs and circumstances.

At North Texas Comprehensive Spine & Pain Center, we offer a broad spectrum of pain management options for chronic pain, including minimally invasive injections, procedures and medication management. Our approach focuses on identifying the root cause of pain rather than simply masking symptoms. We specialize in treating conditions such as back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathy, and complex regional pain syndrome.

Our Integrative Approach

We utilize physical therapy and counseling with a goal of minimizing the use of opioid medication. This multidisciplinary strategy helps patients achieve sustainable pain relief while reducing dependency on prescription medications. Our team works closely with each patient to develop realistic goals and expectations for their pain management journey.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Located at 1001 E Sara Swamy Dr Suite #220, Sherman, TX 75090, our modern facility is equipped with advanced diagnostic and treatment technologies. We've created a comfortable, welcoming environment where patients can receive the highest standard of care in a convenient location serving the North Texas region.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, call us at (903) 892-1999. You can also visit our website at www.ntxspineandpain.com for additional information about our practice, treatment options, and patient resources.
column11: We offer a broad spectrum of pain management options for chronic pain, including minimally invasive injections, procedures and medication management. We utilize physical therapy and counseling with a goal of minimizing the use of opioid medication.

I have been seeing them off and on for the past few years and she is amazing and does a great job at what she does and enjoys her patience and takes her time so walk through everything with you and answer any questions that you have I would definitely recommend seeing North Texas comprehensive spine and pain specialist and their team.|Edit - I went back a second time to get MRI results and give a second chance. The Doctor never even came in. I never saw a doctor at my visit yesterday. The Nurse didn't give my full results from my MRI and I was only offered the same medications I previously refused due to terrible side effects. She told me the one medication was my ONLY option. Horrible.

Horrible experience. Idk how this place has such raving reviews. I was so much looking forward to this visit because everyone said how amazing and I had a completely different experience. Doctor wasn't even with me 5 minutes (my very first visit, mind you) and put me back on a med I specifically said I had taken before and didn't want to take again. I was looking forward to some relief, only to be sorely disappointed by an incompetent and uncaring staff from start to finish.|Every time I have an appointment with Dr. Vattam I enjoy the staff and Dr s. Everyone in the office makes it a point to go above and beyond to make me comfortable. They are so pleasant and kind. I look forward to seeing them.|Everyone was nice and helpful. Dr. Vattam listened to my issues and was very thorough at looking at my current cancer treatment and how he could help treat me without interfering with my treatment. I was so glad that I wasn't just put on another pain medicine to deal with my pain, but was given medication to help treat what is causing the pain.|I love Dr. Vattam and his staff. They are all very helpful and kind. I drive 2 hrs each month to get the medical treatment I need and know that I am in good hands with Dr. Vattam. He listens to me when I have a problem and helps me, he also understands what pain I am in.|Dr Vattam was awesome. He answered all my questions, and I finally had a true understanding of my osteoarthritis and what damaged nerves can do. I was diagnosed with this in 1978, I was twenty-seven.

Thanks again! North Texas Surgery Center|I have been to several pain management clinics in the past 20 plus years.

So I can say I am truly sorry to be moving home to the TX coast ONLY because I will miss the Drs and Nurses and Staff at DR Vattam clinic.Helene,Sandra Jennifer and Addison.
U guys are Awesome|Have ALWAYS felt that I was a valued patient and I TRUST Dr Vattam to do everything possible to lower my PAIN threshold ... have NO regrets about any of the treatments I have received.  His has the GREATEST and FRIENDLIEST staff of any doctor I have visited !!!  They have ALL been good to me !!!  I'M A LUCKY MAN ...

column2: Texas Pain and Spine Physicians: Ali M. Khan, MD
column3:
Texas Pain and Spine Physicians serves Round Rock, TX and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Led by Dr. Ali M. Khan, MD, our practice specializes in treating chronic and acute pain conditions through innovative, minimally invasive techniques. Our team of dedicated specialists works diligently to develop personalized treatment plans that address the root causes of pain while improving patients' quality of life and functionality.

At Texas Pain and Spine Physicians, we understand that chronic pain can be debilitating and affects every aspect of your life. Our multidisciplinary approach combines advanced diagnostic capabilities with cutting-edge treatments to provide effective relief for conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathy, and complex regional pain syndrome. Dr. Khan brings extensive training and experience in interventional pain procedures, offering solutions that minimize medication dependence and focus on long-term pain management strategies.

Our Comprehensive Approach

We believe in treating the whole person, not just the symptoms. Each patient receives a thorough evaluation to determine the underlying causes of their pain. Our treatment options include epidural steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and regenerative medicine therapies. We coordinate care with physical therapists, psychologists, and other specialists when needed to ensure comprehensive pain management.

Convenient Location and Accessibility

Located at 7215 Wyoming Springs Dr #300a in Round Rock, Texas 78681, our modern facility is equipped with state-of-the-art technology to provide the highest standard of care. We welcome new patients and accept most major insurance plans. To schedule a consultation with Dr. Khan and take the first step toward pain relief, call us at (512) 388-1190 or visit our website at www.texaspainspine.com.

column40:
Unacceptable , and to leave a patient over the weekend without a refill as discused today, leaves me on the phone with ARC Emergency RN to mitigate suddenly getting off of Duluxoline 60MG witch is highly unreccomended , SMH
This is not OK.|Doctor Khan is an excellent doctor. I have been going to him since 2017. He takes his time to listen and ask questions about my issues and always been giving me great advice on how to treat my pain management. I truly appreciate his talent and his expertise in his profession. If you are looking for great doctor that would give you the time to listen to you and help you manage your pain, then you must go see Doctor Khan. I am so grateful to him for helping me to manage my pain.|Dr. Khan's level of care plummeted after my insurance changed to Medicare. Despite being a loyal patient for 8 years, his lack of concern for my quality of life and pain was appalling. He dismissed my concerns, pain, and restrictions without a second thought, leaving me feeling invalidated and uncared for. It's disheartening and disappointing that a pain management physician lacks basic compassion for someone in pain. Avoid at all costs.|Dr. Khan is always on time and makes me feel like I am his only patient. He listens and is very attentive. The staff is AWESOME. Very efficient. I love it that he can sometimes do appointments via Zoom. I can't recommend enough.|Staff and Dr Khan are excellent. Always answers the phone and tends to your needs and does their best to accommodate their patient. Wish all doctor's offices were ran like this one.  Dr. Khan is very knowledgeable and sincerely tries to help you.|I came into Dr Khan's office to get treated for pain associated with a protruding disc that was pinching my nerve.   Dr Khan was incredibly patient and described my options and helped me understand the severity of my injury.  He was very professional and made me feel at ease during the procedure by letting me know what he was going to do before he did it and informing me of what I should expect to feel.   I highly recommend Dr Khan to anyone in need of a pain doctor.  His staff were also very professional and my overall experience couldn't have been better.|Dr Khan and his team are always first class in their work & getting me to the correct resolution.   I have been going to see him/them for about seven years now whenever my back flares up.  Surgery never needed.    Don't hesitate  to book an appt.|I have lupus, arthritis and chronic nerve pain throughout my body. So I have been sent to multiple pain clinics over the years. I recently had my shoulder replaced and was referred here by the surgeon that replaced my shoulder. This is by far the best pain clinic that I have been sent to. Dr. Khan actually, legitimately cares and listens to his patients. He's NOT one of those that will insist on putting out a forest fire with a garden hose. He will care about you, listen to you and come up with a legitimate, safe plan to treat your pain. And if your pain is temporary, then he will gently, as your pain dissipates, walk down your medication. And/Or if you have chronic pain, HE WILL come up with a more permanent solution. One thing he won't do is leave you hanging, suffering.
Another major plus about this clinic is the staff. Just like Doc Khan, his staff actually care and actually want to help you. They have helped several times to straighten out insurance or pharmaceutical issues for me and they do it in a timely manner. They ALWAYS answer the phone or return your calls. Which is something that has become very rare these days. My mother's pain clinic in Temple, TX have not answered their phone since 2010. Their (my Mother's pain clinic in Temple) favorite saying when confronted about their inability to answer the phone or return her calls is, "Well, if you're really hurting that bad then you'll just come in to see us about any of your issues".
Bottom line, this guy cares about his patients and his care reflects in not just his actions but in those that he hires to run his practice as they really do care as well. If I could give him/them ten stars I would.

column3:
Dallas Pain Consultants serves patients throughout Dallas, Texas and surrounding communities with specialized pain management services. Our dedicated team of board-certified physicians combines decades of experience with innovative treatments to address chronic and acute pain conditions. Located in the heart of Dallas, our practice has established a reputation for excellence by focusing on personalized care that treats each patient as an individual with unique needs and circumstances.

At Dallas Pain Consultants, we understand that successfully treating pain requires skill, patience, empathy, and staying current within our field. Our physicians employ a multidisciplinary approach that may include interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and complementary therapies. We specialize in treating conditions including but not limited to:

  • Chronic back and neck pain

  • Joint pain and arthritis

  • Neuropathic pain conditions

  • Post-surgical pain

  • Complex regional pain syndrome

  • Fibromyalgia and myofascial pain

Our Patient-Centered Approach

We are committed to a personalized approach to treating an array of conditions. Each patient receives a thorough evaluation, leading to comprehensive treatment plans designed to improve quality of life and restore function. Our goal extends beyond pain relief—we aim to help patients return to their daily activities and enjoy life more fully.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Our modern clinic at 1411 N Beckley Ave, Pavillion 3, Suite 152 in Dallas is equipped with advanced diagnostic and treatment technology. The comfortable environment was designed with our patients' needs in mind, ensuring a positive experience from the moment you walk through our doors.

Contact Dallas Pain Consultants

If you're struggling with chronic pain, we invite you to discover how our specialized care can help improve your quality of life. Contact us today to schedule a consultation.

Phone: +1 214-948-7700

Address: 1411 N Beckley Ave, Pavillion 3, Suite 152, Dallas, TX 75203, United States

Website: https://dallaspainconsultants.com/

column40:
I was 13 minutes late for my appointment, one other person in the waiting room and they tell me I have to reschedule. I have sat in the waiting room way pass my appointment time and only got a "sorry, we're running a little behind". Time for a new Dr.|These clowns have nobody answering their phone nobody returning phone calls The call is dropped while you're leaving a message I even sent a fax that was confirmed requesting a phone call for an appointment nothing. Avoid these uncaring yahoos|I needed to find a new doctor since the doctor I have seen for 10 years was not on any of the new plans I had access to. I scheduled an appointment about one month ahead of time. They called an hour before my scheduled appointment to tell me they finally reviewed the detailed information I provided as soon as my appointment was scheduled. A month ago! They advised me they will not prescribe the medication I am on and have been on for almost ten years. I have managed to radically reduce the dose over that time, but it the only thing that works to control my pain. I'm out of medication and they called me an hour before my appointment to say. Sorry. Our bad, but we won't prescribe that medication. A pain management doctor that refuses to prescribe a common pain medication. It would have been fine if they told me that immediately. It would have given me time to find a new doctor. I am so frustrated and cannot rate this practice low enough. I provided them timely information and they did not provide a timely response. Stay away from this practice. Now I'm reading from many other patients that have also had issues with this practice.|Marcy (nurse at DPC)  is the best.  She really helped me settle my nerves and her smile calmed me. Being sedated for a procedure is not a very fun thing, but Marcy really helped me settle and prepare. She does her job very well explaining everything very well along the way.|On my second visit I was told that since I hadn't received a surgery or injection that there was no reason for me to come to Dr krauses office any more the dr gave me a list of drs to go to instead when I asked a question dr Krauss seem to get upset and immediately changed my last Rx from a 4 week to a 2 week supply left the room and never returned just sent in the nurse. I believe these drs get paid by surgery and when faced with a patient that is apprehensive about surgery they can't cope. They also messed up my prescription mg from 100 mg to 50mg and acted like I was nuts wen I brought it up. They did do a few thing good so thats why I left 2 star instead of 1.
Cannot recommend dr here seem $ driven and not care driven.
Thank you|The experience I have had is horrifying. I was referred to them for an injection in March. They have scheduled the injection multiple times and then call and cancel telling me to reschedule. I have needed relief for 3 months now and have yet to get treated. In July Dr Michaels could only find 2 days to give injections the 5th and 26th. They called me at 4pm on the 25th to cancel, and rescheduled me for the 28th, now on the 27th, I am told Dr Michaels is canceling all 28th procedures and I will have to call back to reschedule. This is just this month. It goes beyond unprofessionalism and borders on malpractice. This company has a real problem and frankly should be ashamed of themselves!|Dr Jenkins has and his staff have controlled my chronic back pain through a series of injections and radio frequency ablasions. I had been suffering from back pain for nearly 20 years. I am now able to have a better quality of life. I wish I had discovered Dallas Pain Management sooner.|Dr. Schuhmacker - Hands down the BEST doctor ever. I have never in my entire life seen a doctor like him. Bedside manner EXCEPTIONAL, he listens, he is kind, and you can really tell he loves his job. He deserves  the ultimate accolade.

We understand that chronic pain affects not just your physical well-being but your entire quality of life, which is why we take a multidisciplinary approach to pain management.

At Pain and Spine Physicians, we provide world-class pain management care with compassion for those who suffer from pain. We're singularly focused on using any necessary methodology in our repertoire to decrease pain and improve our patient's physical and emotional status to its fullest. Thank you guys.|Dr Haque is a very compassionate man and he tries to find solutions for pain, without surgery. He's been very patient with me because I don't want more surgeries.. I've had 3 and none have worked.. Great doctor, I highly recommend Pain Spine Physicians!|I was one of Dr Hague's first patients in Sherman. He has almost completely eliminated the debilitating migraines that I've suffers with for decades. He is impressively knowledgeable and communicates well with my primary doctor. Definitely 5 STARS|Dr Haque is the best pain management doctor! I had terrible pain on both of my shoulders, so he gave me a precision shot using a live X-ray! All of my pain's gone!|I am an amputee with multiple injuries that occurred resulting in broken bones from neck , hip , femur and knee was referred to this doctor was $100  co pay for each visit just to speak to him . He prescribed me new medication that was ridiculously priced and dissolvable not pill form. That made me throw up and did not help the situation at all . When I asked to be put on my old medication at first he said no then he told me he would only give me 2 week supply as well as half the dose then have to see him again for a new visit. When I told him my other doctor prescribed it this way he got mad said I should go to him and kicked me out of his office. I have never been treated with such disrespect from a doctor in my whole life.|I am Dan's wife, Fran Schully, using his Google Account.  My experience at Dr. Hauck"s office was totally pleasant, without any undesirable occurrence!  The nurses were gentle and very excellent. The nurse who placed the needle for my IV placed it without any discomfort.  The young man who was the Anesthetist  carefully explained the procedure for beginning and ending the anesthetic.  I had no anxiety and simply went to sleep and waked up again when the procedure was finished.  I exclaimed to the nurses that I wished the whole team could have participated in my last three surgeries because the whole experience was so easy, calm, and offered no anxiety at all!
Thank you, Dr. Hauck, for having such an exemplary staff and for your expertise in performing this procedure!  I am thankful for all of you!|Great staff that treats you like family and this is the first time I've had sustainable pain relief in a long time. Very grateful for Pain and Spine Physicians of Sherman.

column3:
Texas Pain Institute serves Willow Park, TX and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our dedicated team of specialists focuses on evaluating and treating both acute and chronic pain conditions through personalized care plans. Since our establishment, we've been committed to helping patients regain control of their lives by addressing the root causes of their discomfort and implementing effective treatment strategies.

At Texas Pain Institute, we understand that pain affects each person differently. Our approach combines advanced diagnostic techniques with innovative treatments to address various painful conditions. Whether you're suffering from back pain, joint discomfort, neuropathy, or post-surgical pain, our specialists work diligently to develop customized treatment plans that align with your specific needs and goals.

Our Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in treating the whole person, not just the symptoms. Our multidisciplinary team takes the time to listen to your concerns, thoroughly evaluate your condition, and explain all available treatment options. This collaborative approach ensures that you're actively involved in your pain management journey, empowering you to make informed decisions about your care.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Located at 110 Mary Lou Dr, Suite 100 in Willow Park, TX, our modern facility is equipped with the latest technology to provide accurate diagnoses and effective treatments. Our comfortable environment is designed to make your visits as stress-free as possible, allowing you to focus entirely on your recovery and pain relief.

Contact Us

Ready to take the first step toward a pain-free life? Contact Texas Pain Institute today at (817) 348-8600 to schedule your consultation. Our friendly staff is available to answer your questions and help you begin your journey to improved quality of life. For more information about our services and approach to pain management, visit our website at https://txpain.us/.

column2: American Pain and Wellness - Plano TX
column3:
American Pain and Wellness - Plano TX serves the Plano community with exceptional pain management solutions tailored to individual needs. Our medical team specializes in developing personalized treatment plans that address the root causes of pain rather than merely treating symptoms. We believe in a holistic approach that combines traditional medical interventions with complementary therapies to achieve optimal results for our patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions.

We offer a comprehensive approach to pain management which is customized to each patient. This approach ensures the delivery of covered services which are clinically and therapeutically directed and medically necessary. Your treatment plan may also include Physical Rehabilitation, chiropractic care and massage therapy, which is offered onsite for patient convenience. Research has shown that the effective use of chiropractic care can improve pain and disability outcomes and decrease costs 30 to 40% and can also cut down on invasive and often unnecessary surgeries.

Specialized Treatment Options

American Pain and Wellness is proud to offer regenerative medicine solutions to a variety of pain ailments which include back pain, shoulder pain, elbow pain, hip pain & much more. Our state-of-the-art facility is equipped with advanced diagnostic and treatment technologies that allow our specialists to provide precise, targeted interventions for maximum effectiveness.

Visit Our Plano Location

Located conveniently at 7920 Preston Rd STE 400, Plano, TX 75093, our clinic provides a comfortable, welcoming environment where patients can receive the care they need. To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, call us at +1 469-267-6647 or visit our website at www.painandwellness.com/locations-plano-tx.

column40: I was referred to this place. I cannot get into my VA (long story)and spend thousands of dollars in treatment. Went to see Dr. Reemer and it was a joke. My back is 9/10-10 on their pain scale almost everyday. It causes sciatic pain all the way down to my feet 24/7. His answer to my pain was a urinalysis and injection..... The injection did not reduce pain, instead it created more pain. I cannot believe nor do I understand how these practitioners blindly practice medicine. Absolutely sickening and depressing.|Dr Remer is good, but the girl at the front desk (Shirley) is the rudest person I have ever met!! Another doctor's office called there about getting my records (which took 2 weeks) and they said she was extremely rude to them as well. How sad. She is sadistic, seems to be taking pleasure in her cruelty.|Incredible Doctor and staff. I can't stress this enough. I've been under Dr Steven Remer's care for 6 years now after undergoing 10 surgeries in the past 10 years including bilateral knee replacements. He was the only reason I was finally pointed to the correct specialists and diagnosed properly with Rheumatoid Arthritis to begin my path of healing and receiving the right biologics and treatments. This office is very sympathetic to chronic pain sufferers and holistically treats their patients in managing their pain with an internal physical therapy staff including a massage therapist and chiropractor in addition to prescription and treatment plans if needed. Dr Remer is highly skilled in various noninvasive injections (not just "steroid shots" but procedures such as Rhizotomies and ESI's), and this has been a key component in managing my pain over the years. He's super friendly and always carries a smile for you to brighten even your worst days. If you choose American Pain and Wellness, it'll be the best thing you ever do. Your quality of life will thank you.|This was one of my worst experiences. I went in as a referral. I was very disappointed with the way they treat their customers. I went in for back pain management and they came up with one solution - pain injections. I'm sorry if I'm the only one who is absolutely not comfortable with injections. As a doctor he is supposed to offer options that I am comfortable with. I know there are more ways such as oral pain medication. Upon asking for an alternative to injections he said """""this is the only option we have. Your pain must not be as bad since your rejecting injections.""""" I'm sorry? How does the doctor decide how bad my pain is? I'm so disappointed. Filled out almost 25 pages of the application, waited an hour, and got this kind of attitude. I'm sorry but doctors are supposed to be comforting not forcing.|While in a great amount of pain this company took 1.5 weeks to schedule me.  Then 2 days prior to my appointment they cancel on me because they don't take my insurance. I am not upset that they don't take my insurance. However I am incredibly frustrated that they waited a week to inform me of this while in pain, further delaying my procedure my another week|If you ever need a therapeutic massage Amanda is the one!  She is very detailed in gathering information about the areas that are causing the most pain and  works in those.  Then once that get works on then the rest of the massage is great!  REMEMBER-regular massages have many, many benefits!|November 1st 2018,  I went to see Dr reamer and I was taking to a back room where I must of waited for over an hour. I was then seen by a assistent Kimberly.she was very loud and rude as well.she had prescribed me Zoloft which I had a bad reaction to.I told her my father and I were very competitive.she told me I need to cut him out of my life like a bad cancer.I told her that was very unprofessional and I did not want to see her again.then I tried speaking to Dr reamer who seemed to have no care in the world about it.as I was leaving I tried to make my appt for a follow-up and as I was informing one of the ladies up front in a nice way of what was said by Kimberly they told me to shut my mouth.I told them not to speak to me in that manner or to not violate my first admendment of the u s constitution freedom of speech ,and in the process they called the police on me,here I am disabled with broken vertabre in back and neck .I've seen Dr reamer for 2 years never had a problem.so watch out for Kimberly and of course Dr reamer showed his real self yesterday.I think I am going to find another pain Dr.I will be fileing complaints wi the state.|The entire group of doctors at American pain and wellness are fantastic!! The most caring and informative group of pain management doctors out there!! I highly recommend this group! They genuinely care!!!

column3:
Texas Pain Physicians: Southlake serves patients throughout Southlake, Texas and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our specialized medical practice is dedicated to diagnosing and treating chronic pain conditions using evidence-based approaches tailored to each patient's unique needs. With board-certified physicians and a multidisciplinary team, we offer both interventional procedures and medication management strategies designed to improve quality of life and restore function for those suffering from persistent pain.

At our Southlake location, we provide a wide range of treatments including epidural steroid injections, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, joint injections, and targeted nerve blocks. Our physicians are experts in addressing conditions such as back and neck pain, sciatica, complex regional pain syndrome, neuropathic pain, and post-surgical pain. Each treatment plan is developed following thorough evaluation and diagnostic testing to ensure the most effective approach for long-term pain relief.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in creating partnerships with our patients through education and shared decision-making. Our team takes time to explain pain mechanisms, treatment options, and expected outcomes, empowering patients to actively participate in their recovery journey. The comfortable, modern facility at our Southlake clinic is designed to provide a healing environment where patients feel supported throughout their treatment process.

Location and Accessibility

Conveniently located at 241 W Southlake Blvd Suite 140, Southlake, TX 76092, our clinic is easily accessible to residents of Southlake, Grapevine, Colleyville, Keller, and North Richland Hills. We accept most major insurance plans and offer flexible scheduling options. For consultations or appointments, patients can reach us at +1 972-301-8896 or visit our website at https://www.texaspainphysicians.com/southlake-pain-clinic/ for more information about our services and to request an appointment online.

column40:
Awful, horrible experience. I have never met a doctor as condescending as Dr. Irfan (and I'm an ER nurse, so that's saying a lot). First, he couldn't be bothered to come into the exam room. Instead he had his assistant bring us into his "office". Second, he walked in wearing a sweat suit. Third, he started off by saying "you've already seen a spine dr so why are you here" in a demeaning tone as if he was put out that we were there. Fourth, he didn't care to take the time to listen to my wife about the pain she was experiencing. When I asked if there were any other meds she could try because nothing had worked so far he said "no she's tried them all, continue with physical therapy then we'll do an injection." When he asked a question my wife didn't have the answer to at the moment he said, "this is stuff you should know, it's not rocket science." At the end he spoke to his assistant and said "are we seeing so and so next?" And then he just walked out of the "office"... I was BAFFLED. Looks like he got a hair transplant and now he thinks he's hot stuff.|Wow I'm impressed!! Savanna was great she is PA and tech and was able to give me the results right on the spot. Dr bajaj is great too he explained the process very well and his staffs are all wonderful. Appointments were scheduled on the same day. I wish that all specialists and healthcare workers would learn from them. It takes all the pressure off of me. Thank you  y'all did a great job|I have been a patient for about 4 years.

Cons- no advanced care for chronic conditions. If you are looking for compassionate and care without constant injections, go to this clinic.

Incompetent and miscommunication of office staff at its finest.
Don't expect anything to be handled timely.
Don't expect to get an appointment right away.
If you're a Zebra and not a horse, don't go here.|DO NOT GO HERE. Doctor has 5 other locations, is only available here on Wednesdays, even then if you book an appointment it will not be honored. They use a call center and apparently even though the staff has recordings of all calls made through them they do not communicate appointment times, cancelations or bookings. Horrible service, do your self a favor, save yourself the headache. Seek advice through actual professional. Chances are you will not even see the doctor.|What a disaster this office is.
First, they don't have any signage on the building showing you where the office is. When you do get inside, there are just a bunch of paper signs taped on the wall for Dr. Irfam.
Second, as a new patient they sent me email appointment reminders with three different addresses for the office.
Third, the appointment reminder they sent had the wrong time for my appointment.
Fourth, the poor receptionist just kept dropping the ball - forgetting things, incomplete instructions, etc.

I'm amazed this place stays in business.|Dr. Irfain is the worst doctor I've ever met. He didn't care or listen to a word I said and talked about himself asking me who my last dr. Was and even looked him up and asked if he was better looking then him... what? When I came in for my back and wrist injections he stated that i was there for neck injections i had to correct him he didn't even look at my chart. When i woke up i realized he did not do my wrist injections that i reminded him about at least 5 times....i was told that i was moving to much and that he could do them if i really wanted them while awake but it will be painful....ive been put under many times I've never been told i moved around ever. I even hand surgery on my hands and everything went fine. I could he was irritated that i wanted my injections that i was supposed to have.....later i get my EOB from my insurance and he changed for wrist injections that i never received....this Dr. Is incompetent and rude. I never returned back after that and have found a sweet understanding and caring doctor. Same your time and money and find some place else they have no clue what there doing.|Please read the last paragraph.

I have been seeing Dr Irfan for over a year now after my previous pain management doctor retired. Dr Irfan has continued his education keeping him up to date on the latest developments in non invasive procedures as well as using opioids as the last option.

He also stays current with the REMS federal compliance program that establishes a relationship between the patient, pharmacy, physician and the REMS team. As a patient I have found this program to be extremely efficient as long as all the parties stay current with the REMS requirements.

Patients need to understand that the program has been put in place for the protection of all involved. It prevents patients from seeing multiple doctors for narcotics or going to various emergency departments seeking early refills or doctor shopping. Dr. Irfan and the staff go over the office policies and as long as you comply with the policies your not going to have a problem.

This process also helps the patient find comfort that the doctor they're seeing is in good standing with the medical board, is a pain medicine specialist or has met the requirements for the REMS program.

I find Dr Irfan listens to my current pain condition and makes the best decision while managing my pain and changes the medication/treatment(s) as needed.
I have nothing but awesome things to say about his clinic staff while he is seeing patients in the Grapevine Office. He sees patients at different offices throughout the metroplex during the week.

The Corp Office is a whole different issue.  I am in hopes that the issues with the Corp staff get better. I have never delt with anyone as unprofessional and flat out rude in my life.  It takes an act of CONGRESS to actually speak to the staff in the office where you see the doctor.  They NEVER return your call. The receptionist who takes your call is nothing but a stop gap measure to prevent you from speaking to the office staff.

I typically get my medications every 30 days. Because of Covid19 they went to telemedicine which is great in theory. The problem is when you do a telemedicine visit they only write for a 15 day supply. THERE IS THE PROBLEM. When they do this the insurance gets you for another copay. Plus the insurance rejects the claim because it looks like your trying to fill a 45 day supply when you get the 30 day supply on your next office visit. My pharmacy tried to address the issue with the doctor but again they get the gastopo that answers the phone and have no clue about insurance.
Sadly I hear other patients, doctors and pharmacies
talk about the same problems.Today I was at another doctors office and a lady heard me calling the office. She apologized for listening but said she has the same problems and now they have started texting patients instead of calling them directly. I won't be signing anything allowing a doctors office to text me when I have a problem.

Please don't get me wrong. Dr Irfan is wonderful and very understanding. He is just an employee like his staff. His office staff in the Grapevine office is fabulous and  very helpful.|Dr. Irfan is great. He helped my wife with her chronic pain and never talked down to her. He has a great bedside manner and is very kind and his staff is so friendly and helpful. Getting well takes a long time and he is so patient and willing to listen. We both love him and his staff. We travel 3 hours one way to see him and it is so worth it.  We will never go to any other pain doctor. Thanks Dr. Irfan!!

column3:
Advanced Spine and Pain serves Draper, Utah and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Founded by Dr. Jeremy Joyal, this specialized clinic was established with a clear mission: to help patients suffering from diverse pain conditions regain functionality and restore their quality of life. The practice combines evidence-based treatments with compassionate care to address both acute and chronic pain issues that affect patients' daily activities and overall wellbeing.

At Advanced Spine and Pain, patients benefit from state-of-the-art therapies and a wide range of treatment options customized to individual needs. The clinic's approach focuses on identifying the root causes of pain rather than simply masking symptoms. Their multidisciplinary team utilizes advanced diagnostic techniques to develop targeted treatment plans that may include minimally invasive procedures, physical therapy protocols, and innovative pain management strategies.

Addressing the Opioid Crisis

The clinic stands at the forefront of combating the opioid crisis affecting communities nationwide. Through aggressive and effective treatment of underlying pain conditions, Advanced Spine and Pain works to reduce unnecessary opioid dependence. For those already struggling with opioid addiction, the practice offers a full complement of addiction treatment options, providing a path to recovery while still addressing patients' pain management needs.

Patient-Centered Approach

Dr. Joyal and his team prioritize patient education and involvement in the treatment process. Each care plan is developed collaboratively, ensuring patients understand their conditions and treatment options. This approach empowers individuals to take an active role in their recovery journey while receiving expert guidance and support.

For more information or to schedule a consultation, visit asappainclinic.com or call +1 801-572-1186. Advanced Spine and Pain is conveniently located at 96 Kimballs Ln, Suite 408, Draper, UT 84020.
column11:
Dr. Jeremy Joyal established Advanced Spine and Pain to help patients suffering from a wide variety of pain conditions regain function and restore quality of life. Advanced Spine and Pain offers state-of-the-art therapies and the most comprehensive treatment options.

Through aggressively treating pain conditions, we believe the opioid crisis our country and communities face can be corrected. Advanced Spine and Pain also offers a full complement of opioid addiction treatment options.

column2: Desert Pain Specialists - Back Pain Cedar
column3:
Desert Pain Specialists serves Cedar City, Utah with comprehensive pain management solutions focused on improving quality of life for those suffering from back pain and other chronic pain conditions. Our team of board-certified physicians combines advanced medical techniques with compassionate care to develop personalized treatment plans for each patient. Whether you're dealing with acute injuries or long-term chronic pain, we're committed to helping you regain functionality and return to the activities you love.

At Desert Pain Specialists, we understand that back pain can be debilitating and affects every aspect of your daily life. Our physicians utilize state-of-the-art diagnostic tools to identify the root cause of your discomfort, whether it stems from herniated discs, spinal stenosis, sciatica, or other conditions. We offer a range of interventional procedures, medication management options, and rehabilitative approaches tailored to your specific needs.

Comprehensive Pain Management Services

Our practice provides a multidisciplinary approach to pain management that may include:

- Epidural steroid injections

- Facet joint injections

- Radiofrequency ablation

- Spinal cord stimulation

- Physical therapy coordination

- Medication management

- Minimally invasive procedures

Patient-Centered Care

We believe in creating partnerships with our patients through education and shared decision-making. Our team takes the time to explain your condition, treatment options, and expected outcomes, empowering you to take an active role in your recovery journey.

Visit our modern facility at 1760 N Main St, Suite 220, Cedar City, UT 84721, or call us at +1 435-238-7000 to schedule your consultation. Learn more about our services at [https://desertpainspecialists.com/](https://desertpainspecialists.com/) and take the first step toward living pain-free.

Utah Pain Specialists serves Cottonwood Heights, Utah and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions designed to improve quality of life while reducing dependency on medication. Our integrated approach combines cutting-edge interventional procedures with holistic therapies to address both acute and chronic pain conditions at their source.

Innovative Pain Management Solutions

At Utah Pain Specialists, we believe effective pain management requires more than just masking symptoms. Our board-certified physicians develop personalized treatment plans that may include minimally invasive procedures, regenerative medicine, physical therapy, and behavioral health support—all working together to provide lasting relief while minimizing reliance on pain medications.

Comprehensive Services

Our practice specializes in treating various pain conditions including:

- Back and neck pain

- Joint pain and arthritis

- Neuropathic pain

Patient-Centered Care
